3acd12be-94a1-4cf9-ade8-c1042f78a807.description: Earners of this badge can skillfully coach any person on any topic, navigate conflict, design responses and recover from triggered states. They understand their impact on others and create conversations that deepen intimacy and trust. Earners are adept at framing powerful questions that evoke conversations that cultivate trust, catalyze self-discovery, enhance insight, and inspire movement into bold action. Earners also qualify for accreditation by the International Coach Federation (ICF).
3acd12be-94a1-4cf9-ade8-c1042f78a807.name: Certified Professional Co-Active Coach (CPCC)

alignments.name: International Coach Federation (ICF)
alignments.description: The International Coaching Federation (ICF) is the leading global organization dedicated to advancing the coaching profession by setting high standards, providing independent certification and building a worldwide network of trained coaching professionals.

alignments.name: Co-Active Certification Program Framework & Terminology
alignments.description: The curriculum for becoming a CPCC is one of the first in the world accredited by the International Coach Federation (ICF).The Certified Professional Co-Active Coach (CPCC) program is recognized as the most rigorous and respected coach training and certification in the industry.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the entire Co-Active Coach Training and Certification programs (over 200 hours)
Have participated in 6 hours of individual supervision and 4.5 hours of group supervision
Complete required reading and audio homework assignments and pass the program quizzes

Minimum of 100 hours proven coaching experience, maintaining a client roster (5 clients minimum), logging at least 100 paid coaching-hours which includes not more that 12 hours of coaching work as client with your own double credentialed coach with a CPCC as well as either a PCC or MCC, and not more than 15 hours of barter/pro-bono coaching
6 to 12 hours of being coached by a Certified Professional Co-Active Coach
Pass an oral exam sufficiently demonstrating the ability to be a coach in accordance with the standards of Co-Active and the International Coach Federation
